transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hanji Manish ji namaskar Suryansh baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se.
Customer: Ji Suryansh bolo.
Executive: Sir actually aapki morning mein hamare business manager se baat hui hogi right?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji ji to unhone actually mujhe bola tha catalog mein Suryansh category banane ke liye aur update karne ke liye.
To sir maine usko bataya ki category to hum logo ne last time jo discussion hua tha aapse to sari cheeze humne edit kar di thi to usme aap mujhe bataye ki sir kya aur add on karana hai mujhe so that main ek bar nahi Suryansh dekho unse baat hui na jo maine mail diya hai uske regarding baat hua tha to maine unko wahi cheeze bataya hai ki madam Suryansh ne cheeze update ki hai but mujhe update ke baad na theek hai by lead to mil rahe hain mujhe mere ko lekin wahi hai ki us by lead mein ye ho raha hai dekho jaise abhi jab mere paas naya koi by lead aata hai na to mere paas turant notification aa jata hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Aur jab us jab hum is jab hum us by lead ko consume karte hain uske baad turant turant immediately call karte hain matlab samjho do minute ke andar call jata hai wo kehta hai nahi madam hamara deal close ho chuka hai.
Fir kehta hai ki bas hum dekh rahe hain.
Haa matlab hamara deal ho chuka hai.
Okay okay okay.
Customer: Kisi ka kisi ka ye rehta hai ki nahi madam humko humne le liya hai hume lena nahi hai koi kehta hai ki bas hum dekh rahe hain sir jaise man lijiye hum aapko pure agar monthly baat kare to 120 by leads lete hain ya 134 by leads lete hain to 134 mein man sakta hu ek do customer aapko aise milte honge but sare customer aise hi mil rahe hain ya sirf Suryansh dekho aap na aap chaho to apna pure jitne consume kiye hain na maine aap us pe na wo kar sakte ho verification ke liye de sakte ho apni team ko ek bhi customer positive nahi hai hamare paas aaj tak.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir theek hai sir main samajh raha hu sir aap mujhe bataye sir mujhse kya aur help chah rahe hain sir dekhiye meri aap mein aapka TrustSeal services dekhta hu handle kar raha hu to sari cheeze sir aapse actually last time pe discussion hua tha to kuch companies ka hum logo ne referral bhi liya tha jisme correction bhi hum logo ne apne hisab se kiya tha product ka name bhi correct rakha but mujhe nahi lagta nahi hai sir ki isme aur updation ki required hai but agar aapko aisa lag raha hai ki abhi bhi kuch response nahi aa raha hai ya feedback aur acha nahi mil raha hai mujhe India Mart se to main sir ek kam nahi kar sakta hu right ki main ek bar aur do teen se companies ka reference aapko bhej ke dekh sakta hu ek bar aap waha pe bataye mujhe ki yaar inki catalog kaisa hai ya inka product kaisa lag raha hai to main unke reference mein kuch product aur edit kar sakta hu sir yehi karke dekhiye sir aapko better response milna chahiye sir waha se bhi aur agar aap kahe to main aapko share karu sir kuch companies ke catalog.
Customer: Dekh lo Suryansh dekh lunga.
Executive: Hello sir main ek kam kar raha hu sir main na aapko kuch companies ke details bhej deta hu aap ek bar dekh lijiyega product add kar jaise bolenge main sahi catalog aapka update kar dunga aur ek aur ek aur sir main aap se do minute aur lunga bahut sir call ja raha hai jo bahut kar raha hai waha se response aa raha hai.
Customer: Call Suryansh call ka to call to bahut jyada call to aaye nahi hai lekin do bhi do teen calls aaye hain inquiry wagera bhi tha usme.
Executive: Nahi sir agar hum dekhe na matlab pichle mahine sir aapke paas sabse jyada call aayi thi lagbhag 22 calls aayi thi aapke paas mein to 22 calls mein 15 calls mein aapne response kiya hai baki miss hui hai.
Customer: Jana tha.
Executive: To ye 15 calls se koi positive customer mile hain sir aapko?
Customer: 22 calls mein Suryansh is calls wale bhi pata nahi ki kya hai mujhe samajh hi nahi aa raha hai kuch kahin to kuch na kuch to missing hai tabhi to aisa ho raha hai mere sath pehli bar aisa ho raha hai ki itne calls 22 call aane ke baad bhi customer convince nahi hua ye to bada mujhe wo lag raha hai nahi lag raha hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir wahi to wahi main bhi kehna chahta hu kyuki sir last month mein 144 inquiry congestion tha hamara aapka discussion bhi hua ek customer to sir definitely milna chahiye tha last month mein taki aapka deal close hota kyuki sir TrustSeal services use kar rahe hain aap matlab ye bana tha premium services hai by lead bhi sir hamare paas mein client jo bhi aata hai aapke paas mein waha pe maturity ke chance bhi badhta hai sir apna TrustSeal services mein to agar conversion nahi nikal raha hai sir to kuch na kuch I guess problem ho rahi hai right ya to hamare side se sir definitely ya to sir aapke side se kuch na kuch ki kuch issue aa raha hai services mein to main sabse best yahi hai sir main pehle ek kam karta hu kaha pe problem kaha pe ho rahi hai kya ho rahi hai main bas yahi cheez main janne ko pareshan hu kyuki problem ho rahi hai to kaha pe ho rahi hai.
Executive: Sir actually main ek kam karta hu main aapko teen se char companies ka reference wagera bhej deta hu ek bar ek bar aap dekh lijiyega check kijiye to isme sir thoda sa time lagega right aap aap mujhe batayega kaun si company ka catalog badhiya hai Suryansh is tarah ka catalog acha lag raha hai iske product listed ache hain is tarah ke do teen companies ek bar aap check kijiye sir main ek bar aap mujhe batayega kyuki sir last time pe bhi aapne humko reference diya tha humne kuch edit kiya hai.
Dekhte hain sir waha se kya response milta hai badhiya to sabse best hai sir.
Executive: Main aapko kuch sir kuch share karu catalog wagera?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ek second Suryansh hold karna please.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Haan sir.
[inaudible]
Customer: Haan sir 18 hai.
Customer: 26 27 28 din ho gaye the complete 26 din ho gaye.
Customer: Ya ya ya.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai sir koi nahi main branch mein hi baat karta hu ek bari.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai main bolta hu unko.
Customer: Dekhta hu sir.
Executive: Hello ji ji main line mein hu line mein hu sir.
Customer: 43 ho gaya time aapka ji.
Customer: Nahi nahi 15 minute nahi wo accurate time chahiye yes.
Executive: Hello Hello Suryansh aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ji ji mujhe aawaz aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan bolo to main na sir aapko teen se char company ke ek bar catalog bhej ke dekhta hu sir ek bar aap waha pe dekhiye sir kaisa aur response aaya baki sir yakin maniye meri taraf se sari cheeze correction mein hi hai sir usme koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Main main samajh raha hu Suryansh wo aapne correction kara hua hai mujhe pata hai Suryansh.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Ek bar dekh ke dekhiye sir last time aur ek bar try karte hain main na aapko kuch bhejta hu catalog ke links wagera ek bar open kijiye aap dekhiye ki koi aisa product jiska name alag hai ya category alag hai jo aapko lagta nahi yaar ye sahi catalog hai right main to ek bar aap jaisa bolenge right ek bar fir hum waisa edit kar denge koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Haa haa.
Executive: Hello Haan main check kar raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji theek hai.
Customer: Nahi Suryansh aisa kuch dikh nahi raha mujhe.
Customer: Abhi nahi lenge yaar.
Customer: Agle hafte.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Suryansh mere ko to kahin kuch isme samajh nahi aa raha hai almost to isme PC bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Kya yaar nahi hai jo cheez hai hi nahi usko kahan se denge bina matlab wala baat kar rahe ho yaar.
Customer: Nahi nahi dena tapko na tap jab ek bar bol diya tapko na jais kahan se aayenge jais tapko na.
Customer: Nahi humko itna faltu faltu itna nahi palenge utna.
Customer: Nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting positive responses from buyleads.

- Feels something is missing in the process.

- No customers convinced despite 22 calls.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to send references of other companies.

- Executive will send catalog links for review.

- Executive assured to edit as per customer feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review catalog links.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, trustseal, updation, response
